des: "Quick and easy potato salad recipe with a lot of old-fashioned potato salad flavor. This will become a go-to summer side dish recipe. Better if made the day before."
ins:
Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until barely tender, about 10 minutes. Drain. Rinse potatoes with cold water to cool completely; drain.
Stir mayonnaise, pickles, eggs, red onion, celery, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl. Fold potatoes into the mayonnaise mixture.
